title: K-12 Flipped Learning and Team-Based Learning Preparation Sessions: Activity-Based Learning Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental self-directed learning skills and experience using online learning platforms
context.additional_context: A short-term intensive social studies program conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments. The goal is to strengthen flipped/team-based learning readiness for project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three key aspects of pre-learning importance in flipped learning and team-based learning
Learners can establish a team learning plan based on peer feedback in online discussion forums
Learners can achieve at least 80% learning readiness using LMS-based self-assessment tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
